content: MT-CTAB OC Screw Grade 8.8 bolt with hot-dip galvanized square washer used for assembling raised floor systems in moderately corrosive environments ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > System connectors and interfaces- - - ### FEATURES:Features Faster progress – longer screw shank simplifies handling, helping you get more done in less time Corrosion resistance – hot-dip galvanized to help protect against moisture and chemical corrosion Part of the Hilti MT system – an economical, all-in-one solution for virtually all modular MEP support structures Applications Assembling raised integrated floor systems (IFS) using Hilti MT strut and girders Suitable for use in moderately corrosive environments ### TECHNICAL DATA: Surface finish: Outdoor Coated - HDG Weight: 0.1 lb. Environmental conditions: Outdoor, low to moderate pollution (C3 / C4 - low) Technical Data | Surface finish | Outdoor Coated - HDG | Weight | 0.1 lb | Environmental conditions | Outdoor, low to moderate pollution (C3 / C4 - low) ### ITEMS- 2332788 - Screw MT-CTAB OC - Package Size 100 pc
